35993dff-0150-48ea-bead-77b8cec8ebed.description: The Sonography Principles & Instrumentation (SPI) examination tests the requisite physical principles and instrumentation knowledge, skills and abilities essential to sonography professionals and students. skills.name: American Registry For Diagnostic Medical Sonography (ARDMS)

41d0134b-adc7-4e70-8875-12497f316587.description: The Registered Diagnostic Medical Sonographer (RDMS) credential raises the standard of diagnostic medical ultrasound practice worldwide and promotes best practices for enhanced patient safety. It is designed to certify competence in the field of diagnostic medical sonography. By earning the RDMS credential healthcare professionals gain a critical edge in promoting public safety in ultrasound.

147c4dc1-7513-43db-869f-fd26caa7221b.description: Earners of The POCUS Certification Academy™ Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm (AAA) Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certificate have demonstrated their proficiency by passing an online assessment featuring 5 simulated AAA POCUS clinical cases; being successfully evaluated by peers; and satisfying practice and experience requirements.
147c4dc1-7513-43db-869f-fd26caa7221b.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm (AAA) Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete The POCUS Certification Academy™ AAA Clinical Case Assessment
Successfully complete a Peer Evaluation
Possess a current POCUS Certifiction Academy™ Point-of-Care Ultrasound Fundamentals Certificate or recognized equivalent
Attest to performing and participating in the interpretation of at least 15 AAA POCUS cases within the last 2 years
Be in good standing, actively practicing AAA POCUS

92a8007f-0b29-4a33-97e0-cc4e02711da7.description: Earners of The POCUS Certification Academy™ Abdominal Trauma Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certificate have demonstrated their proficiency by passing an online assessment featuring 5 simulated Abdominal Trauma POCUS clinical cases; being successfully evaluated by peers; and satisfying practice and experience requirements.
92a8007f-0b29-4a33-97e0-cc4e02711da7.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Abdominal Trauma Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the The POCUS Certification Academy™ Abdominal Trauma Clinical Case Assessment
Successfully complete a Peer Evaluation
Possess a current POCUS Certification Academy™ Point-of-Care Ultrasound  Fundamentals Certificate or recognized equivalent
Attest to performing and participating in the interpretation of at least 20 Abdominal Trauma POCUS cases within the last 2 years
Be in good standing, actively practicing Abdominal Trauma POCUS

989a95a7-ac83-45ed-b9fb-ac1bc58f37d9.description: Earners of The POCUS Certification Academy™ Cardiac Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certificate have demonstrated their proficiency by passing an online assessment featuring 10 simulated Cardiac POCUS clinical cases; being successfully evaluated by peers; and satisfying practice and experience requirements.
989a95a7-ac83-45ed-b9fb-ac1bc58f37d9.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Cardiac Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete The POCUS Certification Academy™ Cardiac Clinical Case Assessment
Successfully complete a Peer Evaluation
Possess a current POCUS Certifiction Academy™ Point-of-Care Ultrasound Fundamentals Certificate or recognized equivalent
Attest to performing and participating in the interpretation of at least 30 Cardiac POCUS cases within the last 2 years
Be in good standing, actively practicing Cardiac POCUS

ac6b8fde-8909-4774-8c7c-15ef7c399d8f.description: Earners of The POCUS Certification Academy™ Emergency Medicine Certification have demonstrated their proficiency with key applications of POCUS Ultrasound used in Emergency Medicine settings. Those who hold this certification have passed a series of assessments in 7 content areas (AAA, Ab Trauma, Cardiac, Lower DVT, Lung, OB/1st Tri & Hepatobiliary/Spleen) comprising a total of 47 simulated clinical cases; have been evaluated by peers; and have satisfied experience and practice requirements.
ac6b8fde-8909-4774-8c7c-15ef7c399d8f.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Emergency Medicine Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass 7 Clinical Case Assessments, one for each of the required content areas
Successfully complete a Peer Evaluation
Possess a current POCUS Certification Academy™ Point-of-Care Ultrasound Fundamentals Certificate or recognized equivalent
Attest to performing and participating in the interpretation of at least 135 POCUS cases within the last 2 years (including the minimum number of POCUS cases for each content area)
Be in good standing, actively practicing POCUS in the clinical areas represented

832a7c5a-6612-49de-96c2-a761bd0ce34b.description: Earners of The POCUS Certification Academy™ Gastrointestinal Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certificate have demonstrated their proficiency by passing an online assessment featuring 5 simulated Gastrointestinal POCUS clinical cases; being successfully evaluated by peers; and satisfying practice and experience requirements.
832a7c5a-6612-49de-96c2-a761bd0ce34b.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Gastrointestinal Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete The POCUS Certification Academy™ Gastrointestinal Clinical Case Assessment
Successfully complete a Peer Evaluation

Attest to performing and participating in the interpretation of at least 25 Gastrointestinal POCUS cases within the last 2 years
Be in good standing, actively practicing Gastrointestinal POCUS

eb32d73a-c568-42a9-8d3c-798f8a9812b5.description: Earners of The POCUS Certification Academy™ Hepatobiliary/Spleen Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certificate have demonstrated their proficiency by passing an online assessment featuring 8 simulated Hepatobiliary/Spleen POCUS clinical cases; being successfully evaluated by peers; and satisfying practice and experience requirements.

2a6318b4-c57f-4b3c-a4ca-f2f19f387477.description: Earners of the POCUS Certification Academy™ Ambassador badge are both experts and enthusiasts of point-of-care ultrasound around the world. Earners exhibit incredible leadership in utilizing bedside ultrasound in their their own practice, as well as advancing the use of medical imaging throughout their healthcare community. Representing their country, Ambassadors meet quarterly to help drive the direction of the POCUS movement, share important resources among the cohort to advance POCUS.
2a6318b4-c57f-4b3c-a4ca-f2f19f387477.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: POCUS Ambassadors are first and foremost volunteers of the POCUS Certification Academy. They participate in the Ambassador Program of their own free will, in order to build educational resources, attend informational events, network with other influential healthcare leaders, and ultimately become decision-makers in the POCUS movement.

POCUS Ambassadors should be active users of point-of-care ultrasound. The level of education and years of use often vary, but each POCUS Ambassador has first-hand experience in the power and potential of the technology.
POCUS Ambassadors will complete the POCUS Fundamentals and the Global POCUS Principles certifications to prove their proficiency in point-of-care ultrasound.

All POCUS Ambassadors have undergone an extensive consideration process, including an interview with the POCUS Certification Academy, a formal application to the program, and a review of their expertise submitted through supplemental professional materials.

POCUS Ambassadors spend the first year of the program developing a proposal, implementation plan, and funding stream for a pilot project that will advance the use of point-of-care ultrasound in their nation. In year two of the program, they will work with the POCUS Certification Academy to successfully launch and execute their pilot project, while collecting data and research of the implemented project.

72a1fe2c-a029-4b5b-9751-891f7a6b565f.description: Los ganadores del Certificado de Fundamentos de Ultrasonido Point-of-Care de POCUS Certification Academy ™ han demostrado su conocimiento de los principios fundamentales de ultrasonido y temas de instrumentación relevantes para el Ultrasonido Point-of-Care.
72a1fe2c-a029-4b5b-9751-891f7a6b565f.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Certificado de Fundamentos de Ultrasonido en el Punto de Atención (POCUS)

badge_template_activities.title: Completar con éxito la Evaluación de Fundamentos, que consta de módulos de revisión y un examen de opción múltiple.
Ser un profesional de la salud con buena reputación e interés en la ecografía en el punto de atención.

skills.name: Ultrasonido En El Punto De Atención

0a510b04-6397-4536-a751-1e96822858f7.description: Earners of the POCUS Certification Academy™ Committee badge are members of an Inteleos Point-of-Care Ultrasound volunteer committee and have demonstrated subject matter expertise in the area(s) of POCUS, Assessment development, education, or other areas pertinent to supporting the program and community ensuring patient safety through the proficient use of POCUS.
0a510b04-6397-4536-a751-1e96822858f7.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Committee

badge_template_activities.title: Holds an active and current POCUS Certification Academy credential(s), or an equivalent professional credential relevant to area of expertise.
Must have clinical experienced with Point-of-Care Ultrasound or equivalent professional experience the area in which you are supporting the POCUS Certification Academy (Education, Technology, etc.)

Regularly attend and participate in committee meetings. Collaborating with team members and completing tasks and activities related to improving or sustaining  education, assessment or community  to advance the mission of the POCUS Certification Academy.
Support the Vision and Mission of the Inteleos POCUS Certification Academy by completing volunteer activities that ensure patient safety through the proficient use of Point-of-Care Ultrasound.

c3207954-28bc-40a6-b582-f4d4a71d1040.description: Earners of the POCUS Certification Academy™ Council badge are part of the Inteleos Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certification Academy volunteer governance leadership and members of the POCUS Certification Academy Council. These individuals have demonstrated leadership and subject matter expertise in the area(s) of POCUS, Assessment development, education, or other areas pertinent to supporting the program and community ensuring patient safety through the proficient use of POCUS.
c3207954-28bc-40a6-b582-f4d4a71d1040.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Council

badge_template_activities.title: Holds an active and current POCUS Certification Academy credential(s), or an equivalent professional credential relevant to area of expertise.

Must have clinical experienced with Point-of-Care Ultrasound or equivalent professional experience in an area in which you are supporting the POCUS Certification Academy (Education, Technology,  etc.). Assumed growing leadership responsibilities in volunteers roles within the POCUS Certification Academy or other non-profit organization.

Support the Vision and Mission of the Inteleos POCUS Certification Academy by completing volunteer activities that ensure patient safety through the proficient use of Point-of-Care Ultrasound. Professionally represent the POCUS Certification Academy with internal and external stakeholders.

Regularly attend and participate in committee meetings, leading the development of annual council objectives that align with the Inteleos strategic plan. Collaborating with team members or staff and completing tasks and activities related to improving or sustaining  education, assessment or community to advance the mission of the POCUS Certification Academy.

skills.name: Approach Business Modelling With A Strategic Mindset

d93bc45d-5394-4357-846c-a28346a98830.description: Earners of The POCUS Certification Academy™ Global Point-of-Care Ultrasound Principles Certification have demonstrated their proficiency with key applications of POCUS Ultrasound used in global settings. Those who hold this certification have passed a series of assessments in 4 content areas (Ab Trauma, Cardiac, Lung & MSK Soft Tissue) comprising a total of 29 simulated clinical cases; have been evaluated by peers; and have satisfied experience and practice requirements.
d93bc45d-5394-4357-846c-a28346a98830.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Global Point-of-Care Ultrasound Principles Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass 4 Clinical Case Assessments, one for each of the required content areas
Successfully complete a Peer Evaluation
Possess a current POCUS Certification Academy™ Point-of-Care Ultrasound Fundamentals Certificate or recognized equivalent
Attest to performing and participating in the interpretation of at least 90 POCUS cases within the last 2 years (including the minimum number of POCUS cases for each content area)
Be in good standing, actively practicing POCUS in the clinical areas represented

146ae517-bd37-41fe-8b0c-51275dc03ac6.description: El Examen de Ultrasonido en Ginecología y Obstetricia para América Latina evalúa conocimientos y habilidades básicos de obstetricia y ginecología, los cuales son esenciales en el caso de los médicos que ejercen el ultrasonido en América Latina.
146ae517-bd37-41fe-8b0c-51275dc03ac6.name: Ultrasonido en Ginecología y Obstetricia​​ para América Latina

267b04c1-141f-4b15-8d51-082c6a89e789.description: The Ultrasound Physics & Instrumentation (UPI) examination tested the requisite physical principles and instrumentation knowledge, skills and abilities essential to sonographer-level professionals. It was the physics component for the RDMS certification however, it is no longer offered. The Sonography Principles & Instrumentation (SPI) examination now meets the physics requirement for the RDMS certification.
267b04c1-141f-4b15-8d51-082c6a89e789.name: Ultrasound Physics & Instrumentation (UPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the education and clinical requirements of one of the published prerequisites. Note: prerequisite requirements are subject to change at any time and from time to time. Applicants must meet current prerequisite requirements in effect at the time of application. The prerequisites listed here may be different from those met by this badge earner.
Approved submission of an application with the supporting documentation verifying completion of the required education and experience.
Take and pass the Ultrasound Physics & Instrumentation (UPI) examination.
